urls.unwound_url: https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2022/mar/24/microplastics-found-in-human-blood-for-first-time?linkId=100000116920161#:~:text=Microplastic pollution has been detected,and may lodge in organs

1507356631859933190.text:
🧑‍⚕️  For the first time in history, scientists have found microplastics in human blood.

👉  The discovery shows the particles can travel around the body and may lodge in organs. However, the impact on health is as yet unknown.

https://t.co/LgLUTekbo5.
